plot: Rick is determined to end his strange nightmares at any cost. But, when Rick begins dreaming, it's hard for him to tell what's real, and what isn't.
title: Shadows of the Mind
plot_es: Rick is determined to end his strange nightmares at any cost. But, when Rick begins dreaming, it's hard for him to tell what's real, and what isn't.
plot_en: Rick is determined to end his strange nightmares at any cost. But, when Rick begins dreaming, it's hard for him to tell what's real, and what isn't.
